field.label: Enable Influx Output
field.help: This will enable InfluxDB as output. Format is without square brackets, just like http://192.168.0.1:8086.

field.label: Influx URL
field.help: Set the URL where metrics shoud be sent to.

field.label: Database
field.help: Set the name of the database on InfluxDB.

field.label: Timeout
field.help: Write timeout (for the InfluxDB client), formatted as a string. If not provided, will default to 5s. 0s means no timeout (not recommended).

field.label: Username
field.help: Set the username for authentication.

field.label: Password
field.help: Set the password for authentication.

field.label: Disable SSL verification
field.help: This will skip chain and host verification.

field.label: Enable Influx v2 Output
field.help: This will enable InfluxDB v2 as output. Format is without square brackets, just like http://192.168.0.1:9999.

field.label: Influx v2 URL
field.help: Set the URL where metrics shoud be sent to.

field.label: Influx v2 Token
field.help: Influx v2 authentication token.

field.label: Influx v2 Organization
field.help: Set the name of the organization in Influx v2.

field.label: Influx v2 Bucket
field.help: Set the name of the bucket in Influx v2.

field.label: Disable SSL verification v2
field.help: This will skip chain and host verification.

field.label: Timeout
field.help: Flush timeout for the v2 Telegraf output in seconds, formatted as a string. If not provided, will default to 5. 0 means no timeout, but is not recommended. Increase if you get timeout errors.

field.label: Enable Graphite Output
field.help: This will enable Graphite as output. Format is without square brackets, just like localhost:2003.

field.label: Graphite Server
field.help: Set the IP and port where metrics shoud be sent to. Format: IP:port.

field.label: Graphite Prefix
field.help: Set an optional prefix to the metrics.

field.label: Graphite Template
field.help: Use a specific output template. For usage see https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/blob/master/docs/DATA_FORMATS_OUTPUT.md

field.label: Graphite SSL/TLS Verification
field.help: This will enable verification of a secure connection to Graphite. Default is disabled for compatibility reasons.

field.label: Disable Graphite SSL/TLS
field.help: This will disable SSL/TLS connection to Graphite host. Default is encrypted connection.

field.label: Graphite Tag Support
field.help: This will enable support for tags.

field.label: Enable Graylog Output
field.help: This will enable Graylog as output. Format is without square brackets, just like localhost:12201.

field.label: Graylog Server
field.help: Set the IP and port where metrics shoud be sent to.

field.label: Enable Elasticsearch Output
field.help: This will enable Elasticsearch as output. Format is without square brackets, just like http://192.168.0.1:9200.

field.label: Elasticsearch URL
field.help: Set the URL where metrics shoud be sent to.

field.label: Elasticsearch Username
field.help: Optional HTTP basic authentication details for Elasticsearch.

field.label: Elasticsearch Password
field.help: Optional HTTP basic authentication details for Elasticsearch.

field.label: Timeout
field.help: Write timeout (for the Elasticsearch client), formatted as a string. If not provided, will default to 5s. 0s means no timeout (not recommended).

field.label: Index Name
field.help: Set the index name.

field.label: Enable Prometheus Output
field.help: This will enable Prometheus as output.

field.label: Prometheus Listen Port
field.help: Port to listen on.

field.label: Prometheus Collector Exclude
field.help: Collectors to enable, valid entries are "gocollector" and "process". If unset, both are enabled.

field.label: Prometheus String as Label
field.help: Send string metrics as Prometheus labels.

field.label: Enable Datadog Output
field.help: This will enable Datadog output.

field.label: Datadog URL
field.help: Set the URL where metrics shoud be sent to. Format is without square brackets, just like https://app.datadoghq.com/api/v1/series.

field.label: Datadog API Key
field.help: Set the API Key for accessing Datadog.

field.label: Enable MQTT
field.help: This will enable writes to a MQTT Broker acting as a mqtt Producer.

field.label: MQTT Topic Prefix
field.help: MQTT Topic Prefix - Will be overidden by the Topic if defined below.

field.label: MQTT Topic
field.help: MQTT Topic for produced messages. if left blank, will default to [ mqtt_topic_prefix/{{ .Hostname }}/{{ .PluginName }} ]

field.label: MQTT brokers
field.help: URL of MQTT brokers. Format is without square brackets, just like localhost:8083 or mqtts://server.net:8883. The same credentials will be used when defining multiple brokers.

field.label: Skip TLS verification
field.help: Use TLS, but skip chain and host verification.

field.label: MQTT QoS
field.help: QoS policy for messages. 0 = at most once, 1 = at least once, 2 = exactly once. Defaults to 2.

field.label: MQTT Retain
field.help: When selected, metrics will have the RETAIN flag set.

field.label: MQTT Username
field.help: Set the username for authentication.

field.label: MQTT Password
field.help: Set the password for authentication.

field.label: MQTT Client ID
field.help: Client ID, if not set a random ID is generated.

field.label: MQTT Timeout
field.help: Timeout for write operations. Default is 5s.

field.label: MQTT Layout
field.help: Data layout to output. Defaults to "non-batch".

field.label: MQTT Format
field.help: Data format to output. Defaults to "influx".
